post:
Scaleway is proud to introduce our own 1GB instance with our world-class ecosystem and at an out of this world price: €0.0025/hour.

1 vCPU, 1 GB of RAM, 1 IPv4 address, 10GB of local storage, up-to 100Mbps Bandwidth, unlimited trafic and compatible with the Cloud ecosystem. **All included for €1.8/month**.

-> [https://www.scaleway.com/en/stardust-instances/
](https://www.scaleway.com/en/stardust-instances "https://www.scaleway.com/en/stardust-instances/
")

As I work @ Scaleway, you will find an independent benchmark here: https://projector.cloud-mercato.com/projects/scaleway-stardust/sysbench-cpu/price-perf-graph
